description: Vitual Machine Metrics from Libvirt Exporter

targets.expr:
clamp_min(idelta(libvirt_domain_perf_count{domain="podman-alpine317_default", instance="worknode:9177", job="libvirt_exporter", event="cpu_cycles"}[$__interval]), 0)
/on(domain)
clamp_min(idelta(libvirt_domain_perf_count{domain="podman-alpine317_default", instance="worknode:9177", job="libvirt_exporter", event="instructions"}[$__interval]), 1)

title: VM
